title: Lag in Ontario, Canada
body: The past month or so there's been ridiculous lag in League. The game is getting unplayable for me, but it's not my ISP. No other game or service loads slowly or has anything close to latency issues. Is this happening for other people too? Any known issues?

replies.body: ive had intermittent packet loss and lag problems and i live in North Carolina. ill upload what the graphs show for the last 2 days for me. hopefully i can learn me a thing or 2. mind you guys i didnt face these problems prior to the last patch (v7.14 i assume i'll upload earlier net logs as well to get a comparison)

> [{quoted}](name=GypsyReborn,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=26uU2TAK,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-08-11T02:49:21.512+0000)
>
> ive had intermittent packet loss and lag problems and i live in North Carolina. ill upload what the graphs show for the last 2 days for me. hopefully i can learn me a thing or 2. mind you guys i didnt face these problems prior to the last patch (v7.14 i assume i'll upload earlier net logs as well to get a comparison)

Here are the logs from the scanner posted to imgur seeing as i dont think they show anything super important. https://imgur.com/a/bYCxG also added a date and time stamp to help compare possible changes in patches as im fairly certain that is what caused it

Eeeeeee yea that's a fair bit of packet loss. Essentially what this means is that part of the data your network is sending to us (data about what the game is doing) is getting lost of damaged along the way your ISP is sending it. There might be a damaged node along the route, or your ISP may just be having some small issues at that moment. Reach out to them to confirm any issues, and if there aren't any, hit up our tech guys in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) for some extra troubleshooting!

I haven't been seeing too many reports of lag around Ontario today, but that doesn't mean that you aren't having issues for some reason. I'd like to go ahead and rule out packet loss as a possibility since that might be why League's connection is being affected and not anything else. 

Use our [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) to scan some of your games network logs that had this ridiculous lag. Grab a screenshot of what it shows and post it here so that I can go over it with you!
